snippet: Judge James R. Spencer’s exasperated, acerbic and often late-in-the-day rebukes of jurors, witnesses and lawyers make him a policing force during a criminal corruption trial of former Gov. Robert McDonnell.
abstract: United States District Court Judge James R Spencer sets fast pace in corruption trial of former Virginia Gov Robert McDonnell and his wife Maureen, interrupting only to routinely admit evidence, consider an objection or call for a lunch break.
lead_paragraph: Judge James R. Spencer’s exasperated, acerbic and often late-in-the-day rebukes of jurors, witnesses and lawyers make him a policing force during a criminal corruption trial of former Gov. Robert McDonnell.

headline.main: In Virginia Trial of McDonnell and Wife, an Imposing Judge Sets the Pace
headline.print_headline: In Virginia Trial of Ex-Governor and Wife, an Imposing Judge Sets the Pace
